Set this bug at "major" severity as this prevent me to display tree in CVS view of Synchronize perspective: I always got several Error dialogs opened and as an empty try with only an expand button...

This only happens with my Linux GTK box not with Windows

Created an attachment (id=33525)
All exception stack traces after  error log dialogs in Synchronize perspective

Note that I've already dowloaded and installed today's build I20060124-0800 and got same exceptions...
